title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp - Spring 2025
description: Intensive 16-week bootcamp covering modern web development technologies from frontend to backend.

content.data:
Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp - Spring 2025 Cohort

Transform your career with our intensive 16-week bootcamp!

Curriculum Overview:

Frontend Development (Weeks 1-6):
• HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+
• React.js with Hooks and Context
• TypeScript for type-safe development
• Responsive design and mobile-first approach
• State management with Redux Toolkit

Backend Development (Weeks 7-12):
• Node.js and Express.js
• RESTful API design and development
• Database design with MongoDB and PostgreSQL
• Authentication and authorization
• API testing and documentation

DevOps & Deployment (Weeks 13-16):
• Git version control and collaboration
• Docker containerization
• AWS cloud deployment
• CI/CD pipelines
• Performance optimization

Bootcamp Features:
• Live coding sessions with industry experts
• Real-world project portfolio
• Career coaching and job placement
• Networking events with tech companies
• 6-month post-graduation support

content.caption: Students working on full-stack projects during bootcamp
Full-stack application example you'll build
